SDG_INDICATOR_INFO: Passenger and freight volumes for air transport, rail transport, marine water transport, inland water transport and urban transport
SDG_GOAL: Goal 9: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
SDG_TARGET: Target 9.1: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and trans-border infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 9.1.2: Passenger and freight volumes, by mode of transport
SDG_CUSTODIAN_AGENCIES: International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO); International Transport Forum (ITF); United Nations Economic Commission for Europe (UNECE); United Nations Conference on Trade and Development (UNCTAD).
CONTACT_ORGANISATION:
) Ghana Airport Company Limited/Ghana Railway Company Limited/Ghana Ports and Habour Authority/Volta Lake Transport Company/Metro Mass Transit Limited

2) Ghana Railway Company Limited

3) Ghana Ports and Habour Authority

4) Ministry of Transport
STAT_CONC_DEF:
Definition:

Passenger and freight volumes are respectively measured in passenger-km and tonne-km, and broken down by mode of transport. For the purposes of monitoring this indicator, passenger-km data are split between aviation, road (broken down between passenger cars, buses and motorcycles) and rail, and tonne-km are split between aviation, road, rail and inland waterways.

As maritime data are not widely available, only tonnes (rather than tonne-km) data at the regional level have been shared.
